code:
// reducer related to auth state;
var reducer=function reducer(state,action){switch(action.type){case"LOGIN_LOADING":{return{isLoading:true,isAuth:false,token:"",isError:false};}case"LOGIN_SUCCESS":{return{isLoading:false,isAuth:true,token:action.payload,isError:false};}case"LOGIN_Failure":{return{isLoading:false,isAuth:false,token:"",isError:true};}default:{return state;}}};export default reducer;
